text: geuga madeuyan-ui umulga-e i leuleoss-eul ttae gachug-ege mul-eul meog-igo issneun mogdongdeulgwa geudeul oeedo gachug deul-eul jikigo issneun du yeoin-eul balgyeon hago museun il-inyo lago mul-euni geudeul-i malhagil ulineun mogdongdeul-i geudeul-ui yangdeul-eul umullobuteo deligo gal ttaekkaji mul-eul meog-il suga eobs-seubni da geuligo uliui abeojineun daedan hi yeonlohasyeossseubnida hayeossdeola
